#!/bin/bash
# change_wsl_hostname.sh

if [ $# -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "Usage: $0 <new_hostname>"
    exit 1
fi

NEW_HOSTNAME=$1

# å¤‡ä»½åŸæ–‡ä»¶
sudo cp /etc/wsl.conf /etc/wsl.conf.backup.$(date +%Y%m%d)
sudo cp /etc/hostname /etc/hostname.backup.$(date +%Y%m%d)
sudo cp /etc/hosts /etc/hosts.backup.$(date +%Y%m%d)

# æ›´æ–° wsl.conf
sudo tee /etc/wsl.conf > /dev/null <<EOF
[network]
hostname = $NEW_HOSTNAME
generateHosts = false
EOF

# æ›´æ–° hostname
echo "$NEW_HOSTNAME" | sudo tee /etc/hostname > /dev/null

# æ›´æ–° hosts
sudo sed -i "s/127.0.1.1.*/127.0.1.1\t${NEW_HOSTNAME}.localdomain\t${NEW_HOSTNAME}/" /etc/hosts

echo "Hostname changed to: $NEW_HOSTNAME"
echo "Please restart WSL with: wsl --shutdown"

# /mnt/mydisk/home/hugo/docker-compose.yml
version: '3.8'

services:
  hugoweb:
    image: nginx:alpine
    container_name: hugonx
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "7080:80"
    volumes:
      - ./public:/usr/share/nginx/html:ro
      - ./nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro
      - ./logs:/var/log/nginx
    environment:
      - NGINX_HOST=localhost
      - NGINX_PORT=80
    networks:
      - hugo-network

networks:
  hugo-network:
    driver: bridge

# /mnt/mydisk/home/hugo/nginx.conf
user nginx;
worker_processes auto;
error_log /var/log/nginx/error.log warn;
pid /var/run/nginx.pid;

events {
    worker_connections 1024;
}

http {
    include /etc/nginx/mime.types;
    default_type application/octet-stream;
    
    log_format main '$remote_addr - $remote_user [$time_local] "$request" '
                    '$status $body_bytes_sent "$http_referer" '
                    '"$http_user_agent" "$http_x_forwarded_for"';
    
    access_log /var/log/nginx/access.log main;
    
    sendfile on;
    tcp_nopush on;
    tcp_nodelay on;
    keepalive_timeout 65;
    types_hash_max_size 2048;
    
    # Gzip å‹ç¼©
    gzip on;
    gzip_vary on;
    gzip_min_length 1024;
    gzip_types text/plain text/css text/xml text/javascript 
               application/javascript application/xml+rss 
               application/json image/svg+xml;
    
    # é™æ€æ–‡ä»¶ç¼“å­˜
    server {
        listen 80;
        server_name localhost;
        root /usr/share/nginx/html;
        index index.html index.htm;
        
        # ç¼“å­˜é™æ€èµ„æº
        location ~* \.(jpg|jpeg|png|gif|ico|css|js|svg)$ {
            expires 1y;
            add_header Cache-Control "public, immutable";
        }
        
        # å¤„ç† SPA è·¯ç”±
        location / {
            try_files $uri $uri/ /index.html;
        }
        
        # ç¦æ­¢è®¿é—®éšè—æ–‡ä»¶
        location ~ /\. {
            deny all;
            return 404;
        }
    }
}

GIT_DIR="/mnt/mydisk/home/hugo.git"
BRANCH="main"

while read oldrev newrev ref
do
    if [[ $ref =~ .*/$BRANCH$ ]];
    then
        echo "Ref $ref received. Deploying ${BRANCH} branch to production..."
        git --work-tree=$TARGET --git-dir=$GIT_DIR checkout -f $BRANCH
    else
        echo "Ref $ref received. Doing nothing: only the ${BRANCH} branch may be deployed on this server."
    fi
done

-- æ ¹æ®æ¡ä»¶åŠ è½½ä¸åŒé…ç½®
local function get_theme()
    local computer_name = os.getenv("COMPUTERNAME")
    local username = os.getenv("USERNAME")
    
    if computer_name == "WORK_PC" then
        return "C:\\Users\\" .. username .. "\\.poshthemes\\work-theme.omp.json"
    elseif computer_name == "HOME_PC" then
        return "C:\\Users\\" .. username .. "\\.poshthemes\\home-theme.omp.json"
    else
        return "C:\\Users\\" .. username .. "\\.poshthemes\\default.omp.json"
    end
end

load(io.popen('oh-my-posh init cmd --config "' .. get_theme() .. '"'):read("*a"))()

# è·å–æœ€æ–°ç‰ˆæœ¬å·

if [ -z "$LATEST_VERSION" ]; then
    echo "$(date): æ— æ³•è·å–æœ€æ–°ç‰ˆæœ¬å·" | tee -a $LOG_FILE

# æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å·²ä¸‹è½½æœ€æ–°ç‰ˆæœ¬

else

function Test-VirtIODrivers {

    $storage = Get-Disk | Where-Object {$_.FriendlyName -like "*VirtIO*"}
    if ($storage) {

            Component = "å­˜å‚¨æ§åˆ¶å™¨"
            Status = "å·²å®‰è£…"
            Details = $storage.FriendlyName
        }
    } else {
        $results += [PSCustomObject]@{
            Component = "å­˜å‚¨æ§åˆ¶å™¨"
            Status = "æœªå®‰è£…"
            Details = ""
        }
    }
    
    # æ£€æŸ¥ç½‘ç»œé©±åŠ¨
    $network = Get-NetAdapter | Where-Object {$_.InterfaceDescription -like "*VirtIO*"}
    if ($network) {
        $results += [PSCustomObject]@{
            Component = "ç½‘ç»œé€‚é…å™¨"
            Status = "å·²å®‰è£…"
            Details = $network.InterfaceDescription
        }
    } else {
        $results += [PSCustomObject]@{
            Component = "ç½‘ç»œé€‚é…å™¨"
            Status = "æœªå®‰è£…"
            Details = ""
        }
    }
    
    # æ£€æŸ¥æ°”çƒé©±åŠ¨
    $balloon = Get-PnpDevice | Where-Object {$_.FriendlyName -like "*Balloon*"}
    if ($balloon) {
        $results += [PSCustomObject]@{
            Component = "å†…å­˜æ°”çƒé©±åŠ¨"
            Status = "å·²å®‰è£…"
            Details = $balloon.FriendlyName
        }
    } else {
        $results += [PSCustomObject]@{
            Component = "å†…å­˜æ°”çƒé©±åŠ¨"
            Status = "æœªå®‰è£…"
            Details = ""
        }
    }
    
    # æ˜¾ç¤ºç»“æœ
    $results | Format-Table -AutoSize
    
    # æ€»ç»“
    $installed = ($results | Where-Object {$_.Status -eq "å·²å®‰è£…"}).Count
    $total = $results.Count
    
    Write-Host "é©±åŠ¨å®‰è£…çŠ¶æ€: $installed/$total" -ForegroundColor $(if ($installed -eq $total) {"Green"} else {"Yellow"})
    
    if ($installed -ne $total) {

    }
}

@echo off
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion

set "video_file="
set "image_file="

for %%f in (%*) do (
    if /i "%%~xf"==".mp4" set "video_file=%%~f"
    if /i "%%~xf"==".jpg" set "image_file=%%~f"
)

if not defined video_file (
    echo No MP4 file provided. Please drag and drop an MP4 file onto the script.
    pause
    exit /b
)

if not defined image_file (
    echo No JPG file provided. Please drag and drop a JPG file onto the script.
    pause
    exit /b
)

set "output_folder=%~dp0Output"
if not exist "!output_folder!" mkdir "!output_folder!"

set "output_file=%~dp0Output\%~n1.mp4"
if /i "%~x1" neq ".mp4" (
    set "output_file=%~dp0Output\%~n2.mp4"
)

ffmpeg -i "!video_file!" -i "!image_file!" -map 0 -map 1 -c copy -disposition:v:1 attached_pic  -metadata:s:v comment="Cover (Front)" "!output_file!" -y

echo Cover added successfully.

rem pause
exit

rem ä¸Šé¢çš„pauseä¸ºæš‚åœå‘½ä»¤ï¼Œå»æ‰remè€…ä¸ºå¯ç”¨(æœ‰é”™è¯¯çš„æ—¶å€™å¯å¼€å¯-æŸ¥çœ‹é”™è¯¯)ã€‚
